title: Scattering stars
brief_description: Heavenly bodies explode. Stars scatter. The after-glow of a physical encounter. ‘Against a pitch-black night-time sky, splendid fireworks explode. From a different darkness, gleaming male body parts light up. Meticulous editing and solarisation make the fireworks seem to emerge from the very centre of the human bodies’.
